query: In the first three places starting with "Fisherman", is any places currently under a severe weather alert? Which day in the next 7 days will have the highest feels like temperature in these three places respectively? What are the sunrise times for each of these places on that day?

api_list.description: Search places by name to get place_id for the Weather Forecast Endpoints and detailed geographical information (country, region, elevation, timezone, etc.) for a given location.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Place name to search for.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

api_list.description: Search places by beginning of the name to get place_id for the Weather Forecast Endpoints and detailed geographical information (country, region, elevation, timezone, etc.) for a given location.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Place name prefix to search for.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

api_list.description: Use this endpoint to search for the nearest named place (village/town/city) from a given GPS coordinates. You will get place_id for the Weather Forecast Endpoints and detailed geographical information.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

api_list.description: Current weather conditions based on weather stations around the world. Updated every 10 minutes. Define your location using GPS coordinates or place_id from Location endpoints.

required_parameters.name: place_id
required_parameters.description: Identifier of a place. To obtain the place_id for the location you want, please use Location endpoints. Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameters lat and lon.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: timezone
required_parameters.description: Timezone to be used for the date fields. If not specified, local timezone of the forecast location will be used. The format is according to the tzinfo database, so values like Europe/Prague or UTC can be used. Alternatively you may use the value auto in which case the local timezone of the location is used.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

required_parameters.name: units
required_parameters.description: Unit system to be used. The available values are:auto(Select the system automatically, based on the forecast location.),metric(Metric (SI) units (°C, mm/h, m/s, cm, km, hPa)),us(Imperial units (°F, in/h, mph, in, mi, inHg)),uk(Same as metric, except that visibility is in miles and wind speeds are in mph), ca( Same as metric, except that wind speeds are in km/h and pressure is in kPa.)

query: I'm about to depart from London to Paris for a business trip. Can you tell me if there will be any precipitation in London in the next five hours? This will determine if my flight will be delayed. Also, I plan to spend some time touring Paris. Can you tell me the sunrise time in Paris tomorrow, as well as the feels like temperature in Paris tomorrow?

The format is according to the tzinfo database, so values like Europe/Prague or UTC can be used. Alternatively you may use the value auto in which case the local timezone of the location is used.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

required_parameters.name: units
required_parameters.description: Unit system to be used. The available values are:auto(Select the system automatically, based on the forecast location.),metric(Metric (SI) units (°C, mm/h, m/s, cm, km, hPa)),us(Imperial units (°F, in/h, mph, in, mi, inHg)),uk(Same as metric, except that visibility is in miles and wind speeds are in mph), ca( Same as metric, except that wind speeds are in km/h and pressure is in kPa.)

required_parameters.description: Identifier of a place. To obtain the place_id for the location you want, please use Location endpoints. Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameters lat and lon.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: timezone
required_parameters.description: Timezone to be used for the date fields. If not specified, local timezone of the forecast location will be used. The format is according to the tzinfo database, so values like Europe/Prague or UTC can be used. Alternatively you may use the value auto in which case the local timezone of the location is used.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

required_parameters.name: units
required_parameters.description: Unit system to be used. The available values are:auto(Select the system automatically, based on the forecast location.),metric(Metric (SI) units (°C, mm/h, m/s, cm, km, hPa)),us(Imperial units (°F, in/h, mph, in, mi, inHg)),uk(Same as metric, except that visibility is in miles and wind speeds are in mph), ca( Same as metric, except that wind speeds are in km/h and pressure is in kPa.)

required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: units
required_parameters.description: Unit system to be used. The available values are:auto(Select the system automatically, based on the forecast location.),metric(Metric (SI) units (°C, mm/h, m/s, cm, km, hPa)),us(Imperial units (°F, in/h, mph, in, mi, inHg)),uk(Same as metric, except that visibility is in miles and wind speeds are in mph), ca( Same as metric, except that wind speeds are in km/h and pressure is in kPa.)

api_list.description: Current weather conditions based on weather stations around the world. Updated every 10 minutes. Define your location using GPS coordinates or place_id from Location endpoints.

required_parameters.name: place_id
required_parameters.description: Identifier of a place. To obtain the place_id for the location you want, please use Location endpoints. Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameters lat and lon.

required_parameters.name: lat

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: timezone
required_parameters.description: Timezone to be used for the date fields. If not specified, local timezone of the forecast location will be used. The format is according to the tzinfo database, so values like Europe/Prague or UTC can be used. Alternatively you may use the value auto in which case the local timezone of the location is used.

required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

api_list.description: Current weather conditions based on weather stations around the world. Updated every 10 minutes. Define your location using GPS coordinates or place_id from Location endpoints.

required_parameters.name: place_id
required_parameters.description: Identifier of a place. To obtain the place_id for the location you want, please use Location endpoints. Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameters lat and lon.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: timezone
required_parameters.description: Timezone to be used for the date fields. If not specified, local timezone of the forecast location will be used. The format is according to the tzinfo database, so values like Europe/Prague or UTC can be used. Alternatively you may use the value auto in which case the local timezone of the location is used.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

required_parameters.name: units
required_parameters.description: Unit system to be used. The available values are:auto(Select the system automatically, based on the forecast location.),metric(Metric (SI) units (°C, mm/h, m/s, cm, km, hPa)),us(Imperial units (°F, in/h, mph, in, mi, inHg)),uk(Same as metric, except that visibility is in miles and wind speeds are in mph), ca( Same as metric, except that wind speeds are in km/h and pressure is in kPa.)

api_list.description: Minute-by-minute precipitation forecast for the next 60 minutes. Updated in real-time based on our AI nowcasting models. Define your location using GPS coordinates or place_id from Location endpoints.

required_parameters.name: place_id
required_parameters.description: Identifier of a place. To obtain the place_id for the location you want, please use Location endpoints. Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameters lat and lon.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: timezone
required_parameters.description: Timezone to be used for the date fields. If not specified, local timezone of the forecast location will be used. The format is according to the tzinfo database, so values like Europe/Prague or UTC can be used. Alternatively you may use the value auto in which case the local timezone of the location is used.

required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: timezone
required_parameters.description: Timezone to be used for the date fields. If not specified, local timezone of the forecast location will be used. The format is according to the tzinfo database, so values like Europe/Prague or UTC can be used. Alternatively you may use the value auto in which case the local timezone of the location is used.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

required_parameters.name: units
required_parameters.description: Unit system to be used. The available values are:auto(Select the system automatically, based on the forecast location.),metric(Metric (SI) units (°C, mm/h, m/s, cm, km, hPa)),us(Imperial units (°F, in/h, mph, in, mi, inHg)),uk(Same as metric, except that visibility is in miles and wind speeds are in mph), ca( Same as metric, except that wind speeds are in km/h and pressure is in kPa.)

api_list.description: Use this endpoint to search for the nearest named place (village/town/city) from a given GPS coordinates. You will get place_id for the Weather Forecast Endpoints and detailed geographical information.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

api_list.description: Current weather conditions based on weather stations around the world. Updated every 10 minutes. Define your location using GPS coordinates or place_id from Location endpoints.

required_parameters.name: place_id
required_parameters.description: Identifier of a place. To obtain the place_id for the location you want, please use Location endpoints. Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameters lat and lon.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: timezone
required_parameters.description: Timezone to be used for the date fields. If not specified, local timezone of the forecast location will be used. The format is according to the tzinfo database, so values like Europe/Prague or UTC can be used. Alternatively you may use the value auto in which case the local timezone of the location is used.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

required_parameters.name: units
required_parameters.description: Unit system to be used. The available values are:auto(Select the system automatically, based on the forecast location.),metric(Metric (SI) units (°C, mm/h, m/s, cm, km, hPa)),us(Imperial units (°F, in/h, mph, in, mi, inHg)),uk(Same as metric, except that visibility is in miles and wind speeds are in mph), ca( Same as metric, except that wind speeds are in km/h and pressure is in kPa.)

api_list.description: Minute-by-minute precipitation forecast for the next 60 minutes. Updated in real-time based on our AI nowcasting models. Define your location using GPS coordinates or place_id from Location endpoints.

required_parameters.name: place_id
required_parameters.description: Identifier of a place. To obtain the place_id for the location you want, please use Location endpoints. Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameters lat and lon.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: timezone
required_parameters.description: Timezone to be used for the date fields. If not specified, local timezone of the forecast location will be used. The format is according to the tzinfo database, so values like Europe/Prague or UTC can be used. Alternatively you may use the value auto in which case the local timezone of the location is used.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

required_parameters.description: Identifier of a place. To obtain the place_id for the location you want, please use Location endpoints. Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameters lat and lon.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

api_list.description: Returns global Sun and Moon information (sunrise/sunset, moonrise/moonset and moon phase) for the next 30 days. Define your location using GPS coordinates or place_id from Location endpoints.

required_parameters.name: place_id
required_parameters.description: Identifier of a place. To obtain the place_id for the location you want, please use Location endpoints. Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameters lat and lon.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: timazone
required_parameters.description: Timezone to be used for the date fields. If not specified, local timezone of the forecast location will be used. The format is according to the tzinfo database, so values like Europe/Prague or UTC can be used. Alternatively you may use the value auto in which case the local timezone of the location is used.

api_list.description: Receive historical weather data for a given day in the past 8 years. Define your location using GPS coordinates or place_id from Location endpoints.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: The UTC day of the data in the past in YYYY-MM-DD format.

required_parameters.name: place_id
required_parameters.description: Identifier of a place. To obtain the place_id for the location you want, please use Location endpoints. Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameters lat and lon.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: units
required_parameters.description: Unit system to be used. The available values are:auto(Select the system automatically, based on the forecast location.),metric(Metric (SI) units (°C, mm/h, m/s, cm, km, hPa)),us(Imperial units (°F, in/h, mph, in, mi, inHg)),uk(Same as metric, except that visibility is in miles and wind speeds are in mph), ca( Same as metric, except that wind speeds are in km/h and pressure is in kPa.)

api_list.description: Get average weather: long-term normals for a given place for the next 30 days. Define your location using GPS coordinates or place_id from Location endpoints.

required_parameters.name: place_id
required_parameters.description: Identifier of a place. To obtain the place_id for the location you want, please use Location endpoints. Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameters lat and lon.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: units
required_parameters.description: Unit system to be used. The available values are:auto(Select the system automatically, based on the forecast location.),metric(Metric (SI) units (°C, mm/h, m/s, cm, km, hPa)),us(Imperial units (°F, in/h, mph, in, mi, inHg)),uk(Same as metric, except that visibility is in miles and wind speeds are in mph), ca( Same as metric, except that wind speeds are in km/h and pressure is in kPa.)

api_list.description: Search places by name to get place_id for the Weather Forecast Endpoints and detailed geographical information (country, region, elevation, timezone, etc.) for a given location.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Place name to search for.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

api_list.description: Search places by beginning of the name to get place_id for the Weather Forecast Endpoints and detailed geographical information (country, region, elevation, timezone, etc.) for a given location.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Place name prefix to search for.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

api_list.description: Use this endpoint to search for the nearest named place (village/town/city) from a given GPS coordinates. You will get place_id for the Weather Forecast Endpoints and detailed geographical information.

required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

api_list.description: Current weather conditions based on weather stations around the world. Updated every 10 minutes. Define your location using GPS coordinates or place_id from Location endpoints.

required_parameters.name: place_id
required_parameters.description: Identifier of a place. To obtain the place_id for the location you want, please use Location endpoints. Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameters lat and lon.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: timezone
required_parameters.description: Timezone to be used for the date fields. If not specified, local timezone of the forecast location will be used. The format is according to the tzinfo database, so values like Europe/Prague or UTC can be used. Alternatively you may use the value auto in which case the local timezone of the location is used.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

required_parameters.name: units
required_parameters.description: Unit system to be used. The available values are:auto(Select the system automatically, based on the forecast location.),metric(Metric (SI) units (°C, mm/h, m/s, cm, km, hPa)),us(Imperial units (°F, in/h, mph, in, mi, inHg)),uk(Same as metric, except that visibility is in miles and wind speeds are in mph), ca( Same as metric, except that wind speeds are in km/h and pressure is in kPa.)

required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: timezone
required_parameters.description: Timezone to be used for the date fields. If not specified, local timezone of the forecast location will be used. The format is according to the tzinfo database, so values like Europe/Prague or UTC can be used. Alternatively you may use the value auto in which case the local timezone of the location is used.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

required_parameters.name: units
required_parameters.description: Unit system to be used. The available values are:auto(Select the system automatically, based on the forecast location.),metric(Metric (SI) units (°C, mm/h, m/s, cm, km, hPa)),us(Imperial units (°F, in/h, mph, in, mi, inHg)),uk(Same as metric, except that visibility is in miles and wind speeds are in mph), ca( Same as metric, except that wind speeds are in km/h and pressure is in kPa.)

required_parameters.name: place_id
required_parameters.description: Identifier of a place. To obtain the place_id for the location you want, please use Location endpoints. Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameters lat and lon.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: timazone
required_parameters.description: Timezone to be used for the date fields. If not specified, local timezone of the forecast location will be used. The format is according to the tzinfo database, so values like Europe/Prague or UTC can be used. Alternatively you may use the value auto in which case the local timezone of the location is used.

required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.description: Unit system to be used. required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: units
required_parameters.description: Unit system to be used. The available values are:auto(Select the system automatically, based on the forecast location.),metric(Metric (SI) units (°C, mm/h, m/s, cm, km, hPa)),us(Imperial units (°F, in/h, mph, in, mi, inHg)),uk(Same as metric, except that visibility is in miles and wind speeds are in mph), ca( Same as metric, except that wind speeds are in km/h and pressure is in kPa.)

api_list.description: Current weather conditions based on weather stations around the world. Updated every 10 minutes. Define your location using GPS coordinates or place_id from Location endpoints.

required_parameters.name: place_id
required_parameters.description: Identifier of a place. To obtain the place_id for the location you want, please use Location endpoints. Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameters lat and lon.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: timezone
required_parameters.description: Timezone to be used for the date fields. If not specified, local timezone of the forecast location will be used. The format is according to the tzinfo database, so values like Europe/Prague or UTC can be used. Alternatively you may use the value auto in which case the local timezone of the location is used.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

required_parameters.name: units
required_parameters.description: Unit system to be used. required_parameters.description: Identifier of a place. To obtain the place_id for the location you want, please use Location endpoints. Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameters lat and lon.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: timezone
required_parameters.description: Timezone to be used for the date fields. If not specified, local timezone of the forecast location will be used. The format is according to the tzinfo database, so values like Europe/Prague or UTC can be used. Alternatively you may use the value auto in which case the local timezone of the location is used.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

required_parameters.name: units
required_parameters.description: Unit system to be used. The available values are:auto(Select the system automatically, based on the forecast location.),metric(Metric (SI) units (°C, mm/h, m/s, cm, km, hPa)),us(Imperial units (°F, in/h, mph, in, mi, inHg)),uk(Same as metric, except that visibility is in miles and wind speeds are in mph), ca( Same as metric, except that wind speeds are in km/h and pressure is in kPa.)

required_parameters.description: Latitude in format 12N, 12.3N, 12.3, or 13S, 13.2S, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

required_parameters.name: units
required_parameters.description: Unit system to be used. The available values are:auto(Select the system automatically, based on the forecast location.),metric(Metric (SI) units (°C, mm/h, m/s, cm, km, hPa)),us(Imperial units (°F, in/h, mph, in, mi, inHg)),uk(Same as metric, except that visibility is in miles and wind speeds are in mph), ca( Same as metric, except that wind speeds are in km/h and pressure is in kPa.)

required_parameters.description: Identifier of a place. To obtain the place_id for the location you want, please use Location endpoints. Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameters lat and lon.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude in format 12E, 12.3E, 12.3, or 13W, 13.2W, -13.4,Alternatively, you can specify the location by parameter place_id.

required_parameters.name: timazone
required_parameters.description: Timezone to be used for the date fields. If not specified, local timezone of the forecast location will be used. The format is according to the tzinfo database, so values like Europe/Prague or UTC can be used. Alternatively you may use the value auto in which case the local timezone of the location is used.

api_list.description: Search places by name to get place_id for the Weather Forecast Endpoints and detailed geographical information (country, region, elevation, timezone, etc.) for a given location.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Place name to search for.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language the place names. Available languages are: en(English),es(Spanish),fr(French),de(German),pl(Polish),cs(Czech).

required_parameters.name: language
